code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/collieflower/Desktop/cc-webapp/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";var initState={authError:null};var authReducer=function authReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'LOGIN_ERROR':console.log('login error');return _objectSpread({},state,{authError:'Login failed'});case'LOGIN_SUCCESS':console.log('login success');return _objectSpread({},state,{authError:null});case'SIGNOUT_SUCCESS':console.log('signout success');return state;case'SIGNUP_SUCCESS':console.log('signup success');return _objectSpread({},state,{authError:null});case'SIGNUP_ERROR':console.log('signup error');return _objectSpread({},state,{authError:action.err.message});default:return state;}};export default authReducer;
